titles.title: Assistance for Families of Space Shuttle Columbia Heroes Act
To provide tax relief and assistance for the families of the heroes of the Space Shuttle Columbia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/11/2003--Introduced. Assistance for Families of Space Shuttle Columbia Heroes Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make applicable to Space Shuttle Columbia victims the same provisions that are applicable to members of the Armed Forces and victims of certain terrorist attacks on death.
